attributes.action: look at the poor state of referees in the premier league
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the government to look at the quality of referee's in the English Premier League.
The number of poor decisions being given s ruining the game.
We believe the likes of Graham Poll & Mike Riley should when they have a poor game come out & explain their decisions. Yet again poor refereeing has cost a team a place in the next round of the worlds most prestigious club competition The FA Cup.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
